Maciej Harbuz

As an eCommerce and PHP development professional with over 11 years of experience, I have a deep understanding of the technical intricacies of building and maintaining large-scale eCommerce systems. I am passionate about leveraging the latest technologies to create innovative solutions that deliver an exceptional customer experience while driving revenue growth.

If you're looking for an experienced eCommerce and PHP development professional who is passionate about driving innovation and growth, I would love to connect with you. Let's discuss how I can help your organization achieve its technology goals and drive business success.

Experience

CTO

FLHF SA

In my role as CTO at FLHF, I am responsible for overseeing the development and maintenance of a variety of systems, including B2C eCommerce (Magento2), B2B eCommerce (Solex), and a wide range of marketplace integrations (ManoMano, Home24, CDon, Allegro, Amazon, CDiscount, Conforama, eBay, Wayfair). Additionally, I oversee the ERP system (Verto), ensuring that it is fully integrated with our eCommerce platforms and that all data is flowing smoothly between systems.

January 2022 - Present

CTO, Co-founder

X-Coding IT Studio

Capitalize on low hanging fruit to identify a ballpark value added activity to beta test. Override the digital divide with additional clickthroughs from DevOps. Nanotechnology immersion along the information highway will close the loop on focusing solely on the bottom line.

Interests

Outside of work, I am an avid stock investor and enjoy staying up-to-date on the latest market trends. I also love staying active and can often be found running or hitting the gym for a workout.
